data.persona: I am a queen. I enjoy fine foods and elegant dresses. I sit by the king at court. I am renowned for my beauty and kindness.
data.description:
You are in the The Queen's Chamber.
This is a beautiful room inside of the palace that is decorated with the finest silk and velvet. The color scheme used represents royalty, royal blue, red, green and purple. The walls are covered in gold and in each corner of the room are golden statues of Greek art. The floors are covered in marble, and despite the patterns, shine so brightly you can even see your own reflection in them! There's also a bed big enough to fit five people on!
There's an a bed big, a chandlier, a the finest silk and velvet, a fireplace, a finest silk and velvet, a statue, and an a bed here.
The the future heir to the throne and the jester are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a crown and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I need to take off my crown.
data.mid_motivation: I want to prepare myself for sleep.
data.long_motivation: I want to look after my health so that I can take care of my child, the future heir to the throne, and be a beautiful and kind ruler alongside the king.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go baths to take a warm bath

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug future heir to the throne

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use book of fairytales with future heir to the throne
